title: Chicken rice bowl
instructions: Cook rice. Sauté onion and garlic, add chicken until done. Combine and season.

title: Turkey quinoa salad
instructions: Cook quinoa. Toss with turkey, chopped vegetables, olive oil, and lemon juice.

title: Beef stir fry
instructions: Stir fry beef with vegetables and garlic. Finish with soy sauce.

title: Salmon with lemon
instructions: Bake salmon with lemon, garlic, and olive oil until flaky.

title: Tuna pasta
instructions: Cook pasta. Warm tuna with onion and tomato sauce. Combine.

title: Vegetable soup
instructions: Simmer chopped vegetables in broth until tender.

title: Lentil stew
instructions: Cook lentils with vegetables and broth until thick.

title: Chickpea curry
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic, add curry and chickpeas, simmer with coconut milk.

title: Spaghetti bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Simmer beef with onion, garlic, and tomato sauce.

title: Chicken fajitas
instructions: Sauté chicken with peppers and onion. Serve in tortillas.

title: Veggie omelette
instructions: Cook vegetables, add beaten eggs, fold with cheese.

title: Shrimp fried rice
instructions: Stir fry shrimp and vegetables, add rice and soy sauce.

title: Mushroom risotto
instructions: Cook rice slowly with broth, add mushrooms and parmesan.

title: Baked potatoes
instructions: Roast potatoes with garlic, rosemary, and olive oil.

title: Greek salad
instructions: Combine vegetables with feta and olives. Dress with olive oil and lemon.

title: Chicken noodle soup
instructions: Simmer chicken and vegetables, add noodles until tender.

title: Spinach lasagna
instructions: Layer noodles, spinach, cheeses, and sauce. Bake until bubbly.

title: Pork chops
instructions: Pan-sear pork chops with garlic and rosemary.

title: Fish tacos
instructions: Cook cod and assemble tacos with cabbage and lime.

title: Chicken pesto pasta
instructions: Cook pasta and toss with pesto and chicken.

title: Turkey meatballs
instructions: Mix turkey with breadcrumbs and egg, bake and serve with sauce.

title: Veggie couscous
instructions: Cook couscous and toss with sautéed vegetables.

title: Beef chili
instructions: Simmer beef with beans and spices until thick.

title: Pumpkin soup
instructions: Cook pumpkin with onion and broth, blend with cream.

title: Eggplant parmesan
instructions: Layer roasted eggplant with sauce and cheeses, bake.

title: Stuffed peppers
instructions: Stuff peppers with rice and beef, bake with sauce.

title: Cod with tomato sauce
instructions: Simmer cod in tomato sauce with garlic and parsley.

title: Broccoli cheddar soup
instructions: Cook broccoli in milk with onion, blend and add cheddar.

title: Chicken caesar salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with chicken, parmesan, and dressing.

title: Rice and beans
instructions: Cook rice and beans together with onion and cumin.

title: Quinoa avocado bowl
instructions: Assemble cooked quinoa with avocado, tomato, and corn.

title: Chicken stir fry
instructions: Stir fry chicken with vegetables and soy sauce.

title: Vegetable fried noodles
instructions: Stir fry noodles with vegetables and soy sauce.

title: Tuna sandwich
instructions: Mix tuna with mayonnaise and assemble in bread with vegetables.

title: Salmon quinoa
instructions: Serve roasted salmon over quinoa and spinach.

title: Shrimp paella
instructions: Cook rice with vegetables and shrimp, finish with saffron.

title: Lentil salad
instructions: Toss cooked lentils with vegetables and lemon dressing.

title: Spanish tortilla
instructions: Cook potatoes and onion, add eggs and cook until set.

title: Beef tacos
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning and assemble tacos.

title: Chicken curry
instructions: Simmer chicken with curry spices and coconut milk.

title: Veggie burger
instructions: Form patties with beans and oats, pan-sear and serve.

title: Tomato basil soup
instructions: Simmer tomatoes with herbs and blend until smooth.

title: Chicken sandwich
instructions: Assemble cooked chicken with bread and vegetables.

title: Ham and cheese omelette
instructions: Cook eggs with ham and cheese until set.

title: Vegetable lasagna
instructions: Layer vegetables, noodles, and sauce, bake until bubbly.

title: Pork fried rice
instructions: Stir fry pork with rice, peas, egg, and soy sauce.

title: Turkey chili
instructions: Simmer turkey with beans, tomatoes, and chili spice.

title: Mediterranean pasta salad
instructions: Toss cooked pasta with vegetables, feta, and olive oil.

title: Baked zucchini boats
instructions: Fill zucchini with tomato and cheese, bake until tender.

title: Mushroom chicken
instructions: Cook chicken with mushrooms, cream, and parsley.

title: Chickpea salad
instructions: Mix chickpeas with vegetables and lemon dressing.

title: Spinach feta pie
instructions: Combine spinach and feta, fill dough, and bake.

title: Beef stew
instructions: Simmer beef with vegetables and broth until tender.

title: Garlic shrimp pasta
instructions: Cook pasta and toss with garlic shrimp and lemon.

title: Chicken vegetable kebabs
instructions: Thread chicken and vegetables on skewers and grill.

title: Cod with potatoes
instructions: Bake cod with potatoes and onion until tender.

title: Turkey wrap
instructions: Roll turkey with lettuce and tomato in a tortilla.

title: Veggie pizza
instructions: Top dough with sauce, cheese, and vegetables, bake.

title: Tofu stir fry
instructions: Stir fry tofu with vegetables and soy sauce.

title: Pasta primavera
instructions: Cook pasta and toss with sautéed vegetables.
